title: Fake Tweet on Pranab Mukherjee Attributed to Rana Ayyub Goes Viral
subtitle: Fact Check: After former President Pranab Mukherjee passed away on 31 August, screenshot of a fake tweet attributed to Journalist Rana Ayyub started doing the rounds on social media.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
After former President Pranab Mukherjee passed away on 31 August, screenshot of a fake tweet attributed to journalist Rana Ayyub started doing the rounds on social media.

According to the viral screenshot, Ayyub, after the demise of Pranab Mukherjee tweeted, “Afzal Guru is at peace today”.
